body.name: eufy Security Indoor Cam E220, Pan & Tilt, Indoor Security Camera, 2K - 3 MP Wi-Fi Plug-in, Voice Assistant Compatibility, Night Vision, Motion Tracking, HomeBase 3 Compatible, Motion Only Alert
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 4 hrs 41 mins
features: Relevant Recordings: The on-device AI determines whether a human or pet is present and only records when an event of interest occurs.
The Key is in the Detail: View every event in up to 2K clarity (1080P while using HomeKit) so you see exactly what is happening inside your home.

Smart Integration: Connect your IndoorCam to Apple HomeKit (download our HomeKit User guide in the product information section below), the Google Assistant, or Amazon Alexa for complete control over your surveillance.

Follows the Action: When motion is detected the camera automatically tracks and follows the moving object. Pan the lens 360° horizontally or tilt it 96° vertically to get a clear view of the whole room.
Communicate From Your Camera: Speak in real-time to anyone who passes via the camera’s built-in two-way audio.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Communicate From Your Camera Speak in real-time to anyone who passes via the camera’s built-in two-way audio. Instant Mobile Alerts* Notifies* you in seconds when suspicious motions are detected. Dual Storage** Options Store your data and recordings: locally with an extra SD card (not included) or in the cloud. Follows the Action When motion is detected the camera automatically tracks and follows the moving object.

Know When You Are Needed The built-in AI notifies* you of excessive noise levels so you know when your little one needs some attention. Instant Detection As soon as motion is detected the camera will start recording and push a notification* in case you want to see what is happening. Activity Zones Only receive the alerts* which matter. Customize the area in which detection takes place to suit your home. Sight at Night Keep an eye on any room, even in low light settings.

eufy Security Indoor Cam E220 Local** Security, No Monthly Fee From your newborn crying for mom, to your victory dance after a game, your personal moments are yours and yours alone. We are committed to products and services that keep your data private and secure. Know When You Are Needed The built-in AI notifies you of excessive noise levels so you know when your little one needs some attention. Activity Zones Only receive the alerts that matter. Customize the area in which detection takes place to suit your home. Sight at Night Advanced night vision allows you to keep an eye on any room, even in low light. 360° Check-Up Get a full view of the entire room at the press of a button. What’s Included: 1x eufy Security Indoor Cam E220, 1x USB Adapter, 1x USB Cable, 1x Mounting Bracket, 1x Screw Pack, 1x Quick Start Guide Notes: Upgrade firmware to v.2.0.6.9 or newer Non-Waterproof; Requires MicroSD card*** (not included) When opening HomeKit, users must add the device in the eufy Security app and then complete the activation process. FAQ: 1. Does Indoor Cam E220 support 5GHz Wi-Fi? No, it only supports 2.4GHz Wi-Fi connection. 2. Is Indoor Cam E220 compatible with HomeBase 3? Yes, it is compatible with Homebase 3, however it currently only supports the storage function. BionicMind modes, and automation are not yet supported. *Push notifications with thumbnail previews require thumbnail preview images to be temporarily stored in the cloud. **If you choose to use cloud-based features such as cloud storage or push notifications with thumbnail previews, videos or thumbnail previews will be sent to the cloud as needed to provide your selected features. ***Use at least a Class 10 microSD card with a maximum of 128 GB.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great security camera.
reviews.reviewText: I already have 9 of these in my house they work great! For the price they really cannot be beat. Picture quality is great, movement is great, sound is good. Easy setup and fast connection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My cats are pretty boring but this thing is great
reviews.reviewText: I read through the negative reviews to see what I was getting myself in for first and decided it was worth it. So far this is a great little device, easy to set up, easy to use, good quality images, and all for a pretty cheap price. A couple of things I saw repeatedly in the negative reviews:1) It's annoying because it captures everything, even when you're home walking around. My response: If you leave it on, of course it does. But you can turn it off directly from the device or from the app when you're away. You can even unplug it and it won't keep watching you. It's amazing how turning something off... actually turns it off2) It makes you pay for the subscription. My response: No it doesn't. You can skip that step in the setup. Admittedly it took me a few seconds to figure out how to not have to sign up for their cloud if you don't have an SD card, but then I saw the "skip this step" option and guess what? I skipped this step. It means I can't save recorded files, but I can still live stream. I suppose if you're using this for security purposes and think you may need a recorded file in case something happens then it won't work for that purpose. But also, what do you expect from a $40 device? Get a real security camera. Use this one for watching your pets or your baby from the other room.3) It stopped working. My response: Ok I've only used it for a few days so maybe I'll update when I've had it longer. But for this price, if it breaks in a year or so, I won't mind. If it breaks next week... different story.Overall, if you want it to have fun spying on your pets, don't let the negative reviews steer you away. This little thing does the trick of proving to me that when I'm not home, my pets are pretty boring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Indoor Cam
reviews.reviewText: I really like this indoor camera. Good detection of human, so-so for pets. Easy to set-up too. Video is good on the Eufy app, poor for using on the Apple HomeKit, which was a disappointment. Information on the features and for setting them up is poor; even on their website. If found it necessary to play and review all features on the app. But, very easy to use and set-up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Crystal-Clear Surveillance works with homekit
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired the eufy indoor camera, and I must say it has exceeded my expectations in almost every aspect. The enhanced 2K resolution delivers crystal-clear detail, ensuring superior image clarity for effective home surveillance.The 360° pan and 96° tilt auto-tracking feature provide comprehensive coverage, making it an ideal choice for vigilant pet surveillance.One of the standout features for me is the effortless integration with Apple Homekit . The camera easily syncs with Apple HomeKit and seamlessly integrates into eufy's indoor camera ecosystem. Only thing I don’t understand is why it needs a Micro-SD card when I’m using iCloud storage.The built-in two-way audio allows for immediate conversation and providing an additional layer of security.In conclusion, the eufy indoor camera combines advanced features, intelligent AI, and seamless integration for a top-notch surveillance experience. Whether you're focused on home security or simply want to keep an eye on your pets, this camera is a reliable and effective choice. Taking one star due to requirement of needing storage card despite using iCloud for storage.Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great garage camera
reviews.reviewText: This camera works perfectly in the garage on the ceiling. Great price for camera in the garage where I could look at in case I left the garage door open and with the motion sensor whenever someone enters the garage I get a notice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid camera easy setup
reviews.reviewText: I have a eufy solar cam in my back yard and love it. Better than ring dare I say? The inside camera is just as solid. Great view with all the features of a baby monitor but less expensive. Great job @eufy for your products!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to replace my broken indoor cameraVery nice featuresEasy to installWorks perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Wifi camera for the money
reviews.reviewText: I have ordered several of these cameras because the quality of the video AND audio are superb! They are reactive, easily programmed, and the app is easy to use and figure out as well. I would love for Eufy to have a waterproof camera like this, but they do sell other waterproof cameras which do not pan/tilt.I highly recommend these Eufy cameras no matter which model you get.

Eufy Security S220 Indoor Cam ReviewRating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)The Eufy Security S220 Indoor Cam has been a delightful surprise, especially considering its price. It's a fantastic choice for those seeking a convenient and budget-friendly home security solution.No Homebase Required: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)One of the standout features of the Eufy S220 Indoor Cam is that it doesn't require a homebase to function. All you need is a Wi-Fi connection, and you're good to go. This makes it incredibly accessible and user-friendly.Seamless HomeKit Compatibility: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)For Apple HomeKit users, this camera is a dream. The compatibility with HomeKit ensures easy integration with your existing smart home setup, enhancing your overall security ecosystem.Effortless Setup: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)Setting up the S220 Indoor Cam is a breeze. It's practically plug and play, which is a welcome relief for anyone who dreads the complexities of tech installations. The straightforward setup process is a big plus.Effective Tracking Feature: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)The tracking feature on this camera excels in monitoring movement inside your home. It provides reliable and accurate tracking, giving you peace of mind when it comes to keeping an eye on your space.The performance of the Eufy S220 Indoor Cam has left me so impressed that I'm already contemplating getting another one. It's that good at what it does.In conclusion, the Eufy Security S220 Indoor Cam is a remarkable security solution, and it goes above and beyond expectations, especially given its price point. With no need for a homebase, seamless HomeKit compatibility, effortless setup, and effective tracking features, it's a winner all around. If you're in search of an affordable, user-friendly indoor security camera, the S220 is an excellent choice that delivers on all fronts.

Hay 2 maneras de utilizar esta cámara.1- Con Eufy Security. Tienes acceso a todas las funciones, microfono, speaker, alarma, seguimiento de sujeto, detección de movimiento de sonidos de bebés perros etc. súper completo. Resolución 2K2. Con HomeKit. Solamente soporta 1080P, debe agregarse a Home por medio de la App primero. No detecta sonidos. Solamente movimientos y también detecta Caras. Es todo. Lo demás no funciona.Yo la uso con HomeKit aunque tenga menos funciones para mi bebé. Porque es suficiente pero solo te recomiendo usarla en HomeKit si tienes o estás pagando un Plan de ICloud porque se guarda todo en la nube y puedes grabar clips o acceder a fechas específicas aver lo que grabó.$1500 me costo totalmente recomendada.

reviews.reviewTitle: Outstanding Budget-Friendly Security Camera with HomeKit Secure Video
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the eufy security camera, and I couldn't be more impressed with its performance and features. Here's why it's the best low-budget option with HomeKit Secure Video compatibility, excellent video quality, human detection & tracking, and a compact form factor.**Low Budget Brilliance**: One of the standout features of the eufy security camera is its affordability. It's perfect for budget-conscious users who still want reliable home security.**HomeKit Secure Video**: I was thrilled to find a budget-friendly camera that supports HomeKit Secure Video. This adds an extra layer of privacy and security, allowing me to store and review footage on my Apple devices with end-to-end encryption.**Crystal Clear Video**: The eufy camera delivers exceptional video quality. The 2k resolution ensures that every detail is sharp and clear, whether it's day or night. The night vision is particularly impressive, providing a clear view in low-light conditions.(but due to Apple conditions it’s reduced to 1080P.**Human Detection & Tracking**: The eufy camera's ability to detect and track humans sets it apart from many other budget cameras. It reduces false alerts and ensures that you're notified only when a person is detected, which is especially handy in high-traffic areas.In conclusion, the eufy security camera is a fantastic low-budget option that doesn't compromise on essential features. With HomeKit Secure Video compatibility, top-notch video quality, human detection, and its compact design, it's an excellent choice for anyone looking to enhance their home security.

I bought it to put in front of my living room window, inside the house, to zoom in on the staircase of the front balcony. Since I didn't want to mount them of the wall/ceilings, I purchased an adjustable security cam stand on Amazon.The quality of the image is very very good, so is the motion detector (no lag so far for the live feed ; connected to the house wi-fi network ; doesn't support 5ghz bands). I bought a separate 128gb micro SD card to put inside the camera so the video can be locally stored there. As for now, no monthly fees (I used to to own ''B-link Mini'' and ''Ar-lo'' security cam in the past.The only 2 cons that I saw is that the camera doesn't do a good job detecting a human from it's AI software (it would sometime detect a car as a human). But since it is a motion, it will still record. The other thing was the Infra-Red mode during night time recording. Since outside has some street lights, the camera IR mode will just record the camera itself (his own window reflection ; pretty weird phenomenon) and you will see some red dots that is coming from the camera. If I switch the IR mode off, it will record normally just like during the daytime (my guess would be that you have to be in complete pitch black room so that the IR mode function properly). No problem so far.In my book, this is a 10/10 in term of affordability, ease of use and quality. Get this model since you can adjust with a 360 rotation from your phone if needed ; not the fixed small squared (C24 model).

Funciona excelente. El uso que le damos es para que nos alerte cuando llora el bebé, entonces no necesitamos tener monitores adicionales. Si tienes Apple Watch, es aún mejor pues la alerta de bebé llorando llega ahí sin despertar a la paraja.
